DIA_WolfSon01_Q515_Jon_03_01: Weren't you the one who went down into the mine to get Jon?
DIA_WolfSon01_Q515_Jon_Next_03_01: You're the reason Jon's dead. You murdered him there in cold blood.
DIA_WolfSon01_Q515_Jon_Next_03_02: Well, Ulryk said that you must be brought to the dungeons... but unfortunately, you were foolish enough to run away...
DIA_WolfSon01_Q515_Jon_No_15_01: You must have me confused with someone.
DIA_WolfSon01_Q515_Jon_No_03_02: There's no mistaking it. I know it's you.
